html:
{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}
name: Job Offer

Thanking you, For NANDAN GSE Pvt Ltd Authorized Signatory WARRANTY CERTIFICATE Certified that NANDAN Product specified herein has been tested without failure before leaving the factory. This product stands guaranteed as per terms and conditions overleaf against manufacturing and materials defects for a period of one year from the date of purchase by the customer. CLIENT _________________ PRODUCT (MODEL) _________________ JOB NO _____________ COMMISSIONED BY ___________ TERMS & CONDITIONS Any part that may, during the period of 15 months from date of Invoicing or 12 months from the date of commissioning by the actual user, whichever is earlier become defective owing to either faulty / design, interior material or workmanship will be repaired or replaced free of charge when sent to our works, freight prepaid. No other liability is owned by us under this guarantee. This warranty covers the cost of replacement or repair in our works only and we disown any further liability for direct or indirect damage done. Replaced parts become our property. We will not be held responsible if the repair or replacement is made difficult by arbitrary attempts made by any other than an authorized agency. We must caution the user against harmful tinkering by anybody without sufficient knowledge or experience. We are not held responsible for damages that may occur during transit. Our guarantee does not cover defects caused due to abuse, misuse, overloading, accidental damages or worm out in service. We are not bound to initiate repair & rectification action unless the customer has fulfilled all required contractual obligations, including payments due to us. Rectified parts or products shall be removed by the customer on intimation or will be returned to the sender by any available means on the sender’s account upon fulfillment of contractual obligations. This guarantee warrant is restricted for One Year only in respect of constant wear & tear spares, such as seals, washers, O-rings, packings, pressure gauges & flexible high-pressure hoses. Under special conditions and subject to our separate written agreement we may agree to extend the scope of this Guarantee Warrant for a period of 12 calendar months from the date commissioning or 15 months from date of purchase, whichever is earlier. CAUTION It is clearly understood that the operator using the product is trained to use the product with due care and caution as to its safe working load, stroke and reach the limit, centrally placed and due safety precautions have been taken care of to prevent accidents due to ignorance or carelessness. In case of doubt, please write for guidance in the proper use of the product. Fluid technology (oil hydraulics/pneumatics) involves precision Engg. Proper and regular maintenance is essential just as safe storage and strict avoidance of contamination of the hydraulic fluid will save the customer unpleasant and costly failures/delays. Selection of the appropriate capacity, Stroke, reach should include safety cushion against unknown forces varying from site to site, job, and working environment. Safety first and safety last is the only guarantee against accidents.
